name: CoReSyF Subset
description: Create a spatial and/or spectral subset of a data product

parameters.name: Copy Meta Data
parameters.description: Whether to copy the metadata of the source product

parameters.name: Full Swath
parameters.description: Forces the operator to extend the subset region to the full swath.

parameters.name: Geo Region
parameters.description: The subset region in geographical coordinates using WKT format, e.g. POLYGON((<lon1> <lat1>, <lon2> <lat2>, ..., <lon1> <lat1>))

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The subset region in pixel coordinates. Use the following format: <x>,<y>,<width>,<height>

parameters.name: Sub Sampling X
parameters.description: The pixel subsampling step in X (horizontal image direction)

parameters.name: Sub Sampling Y
parameters.description: The pixel subsampling step in Y (vertical image direction)

parameters.name: Tie point Grid Names
parameters.description: The comma separated list of names of tie point grids to be copied. If not given, all bands are copied.
